Player Command
==============

See: `skills <skills.html>`_ `hp <hp.html>`_ `stats <stats.html>`_ `score <score.html>`_ 

USAGE 

 |  ``materials``
 |  ``materials all`` - show all materials on the MUD

Shows your materials and all the materials in it.
